content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://azuresynapsestorage1.dfs.core.windows.net/dwtemp/Drilling_Dataset.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        FIRSTROW=2
    )WITH
    (
    RigID int 1,
    DrillingDepth int 2,
    DrillingSpeed int 3,
    [Location] varchar(200) 4,
    [Date] DATE 5 
    ) AS [result]
